title: VideoNoteProcessor Issues
details:
# VideoNoteProcessor Code Issues

There appear to be issues with the `VideoNoteProcessor.cs` file which is preventing successful compilation:

1. Error CS1022: Type or namespace definition, or end-of-file expected at line 29
2. Error CS1022: Type or namespace definition, or end-of-file expected at line 1111

The key issue seems to be a formatting problem in the file, specifically:
- Line 23 has the class declaration on the same line as the closing `</remarks>` tag, which is causing parsing issues
- The file may have other XML documentation formatting issues

We're not able to directly modify the `VideoNoteProcessor.cs` file at this time due to these formatting issues. Our approach should be:

1. Inform the developer about the formatting issues in VideoNoteProcessor.cs that need to be fixed first
2. Once the formatting is fixed:
   - Update VideoNoteProcessor to accept an ILoggingService parameter
   - Use the logging service for creating all child loggers
   - Remove direct LoggerFactory instantiations

We should also check for similar issues in:
- PdfNoteProcessor.cs (also found to have direct LoggerFactory instantiations)
- Any other processor classes that might be following the same pattern
